conversation.question: what is avalanche method?
conversation.answer: The avalanche method focuses on paying off debts with the highest interest rates first to save on total interest paid in the long run. Continue making minimum payments on other debts while targeting the highest-rate debt with extra payments until it is cleared. Then, move to the next highest-rate debt.
